div.p: This code system http://testSK.org/CodeSystem/medication-statement-cs defines the following codes:

tr.td: The patient was taking antidiabetic medication prior to hospital admission or before the stroke event
The patient was taking antiplatelet medication prior to hospital admission or before the stroke event
The patient was taking aspirin (acetylsalicylic acid) prior to hospital admission or before the stroke event
The patient was taking clopidogrel prior to hospital admission or before the stroke event

description.value: Codes representing various medication-related procedures and findings (e.g., therapies, administration procedures, findings about use).

definition.value: The patient was taking antidiabetic medication prior to hospital admission or before the stroke event

The patient was taking aspirin (acetylsalicylic acid) prior to hospital admission or before the stroke event
